trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Preston
There were no other sightings in Preston on or around August 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy family and i was out camping in croston on a campsite called the royal umpire. we was all sat out side the tent from about 9pm up until 11.45pm.Around 10.30pm my dad just said what the bloodyhell is that,as i looked round there was this bright orange glow in the sky moving quite slowley,it was a very clear sky not a cloud insight. with it being a family weekend i had my camera. i managed to get some photos then before our eyes it just seemed to disapere.as soon as it disapered we all got round the camera to have a look at the pictures id just taken and on the pictures there was 2 more red lights which was not visable to any of us when seeing the object in the sky. all 5 of us agreed there was no red lights, which really puzzled us when viewing the pictures. as soon as we got home we couldnt wait to get the pictures on the pc to view them on a bigger screen. hope someone will be able to put some light on this for us as we are all very excited by what weve seen.
